Subject: Re: [rest-discuss] Re: how to model actions
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=221647988

Did anybody mention this article in relation to this issue?
http://duncan-cragg.org/blog/post/business-functions-rest-dialogues/

What do people think of it?

There's also a critique at:
http://www.addsimplicity.com/adding_simplicity_an_engi/2007/01/a_real_ebay_arc.html

One of his main counter-arguments seems to be CompleteSale, which I
thought Duncan Cragg could have handled more explicitly, as he did
with ResponseToBestOffer.
